title: Christmas Avatars - post here for one
body:
Inspired by this thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/Hz1l6iAQ-wheres-the-christmas-fek-thread

We at FEKEvents decided to make a thread for this. We'll be spoofing up your avatars for christmas if you post here.

Anyone who wants to help is free to, we might even give you a little gift if you help us out enough.

If you do not want the snow/hat, be sure to say so.


Here is an example of what I'll do to your image:
http://i.imgur.com/LNmklIm.gif
